lead_paragraph: Barcelona will not be knocked off course by their 3-1 defeat at Manchester City in the Champions League on Tuesday despite being outplayed in the second half by Pep Guardiola's fired-up side, the Catalan club's manager Luis Enrique said.

headline.print_headline: Barca Will Not Sink After City Defeat, Says Luis Enrique
headline.main: Barca Will Not Sink After City Defeat, Says Luis Enrique

snippet: Barcelona will not be knocked off course by their 3-1 defeat at Manchester City in the Champions League on Tuesday despite being outplayed in the second half by Pep Guardiola's fired-up side, the Catalan club's manager Luis Enrique said....
